features: ❥Process way: Rod Pocket Top, easy to install and hang.

❥Material: Transparent Voile/Polyester Blend. The Sheer Curtains Let The Daylight Through But Provide Privacy, So They Are Perfect to Use in A Layered Window Solution and Make Your Home Very Romantic.

❥Energy Efficient while you set up at home, suitable for living room, Kitchen, Bureau Door, Children's room etc. .and Warm Iron as Desired Since the Curtains May Come with Some Wrinkles Regards to Packaged. Applying Water or Through Laundering or Steaming Is The Fastest Way to Remove Wrinkles.

description: Make your room romantic and nice when you hang sheer curtain. Can be used as a door curtain, window curtain or a background for a shop window display.

1. Cover your windows and enhance natural light filtering with  sheer curtain panels. Each panel is easy to remove for cleaning and maintenance and won't wrinkle when hanging in front of your windows either.

2. These sheer window curtains are ideal window treatments for living room . Not only do they provide privacy, they also allow the sun's soft light to gently stream into a room. The panels are offered in different lengths,
thereby ensuring a custom fit for covering a window or door.
3. Machine washable in cold water, Gentle cycle, No bleach, Tumble dry. Iron at low temperature settings if needed.
4. Our products' pictures are real and shot by professionals. However, due to differences in computer monitors display, there can be color variations between the actual product and your screen.
